ProjectText.0: I like to code things from scratch and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser.

BackgroundText.0: Currently I work at Santander Bank as Frontend Developer and at Ironhack Bootcamp as Teacher Assistant

AcademicTimelineTitle.1: University of Applied Sciences - Frankfurt am Main

AcademicTimelineDescription.0:
Bootcamp of Web Development. Subjects: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node, Express, Mongo and REACT.
My first project was a game. Its logic creates mazes randomly only with javascript and CSS.
My second project was a spending control platform, made in node.js
And the final project was a betting platform with transaction control through Blockchain, made in React and Node.js
AcademicTimelineDescription.1: I got a government scholarship to study for one and a half year at Germany. There, I studied at Fachhochschule Frankfurt am Main (University of Applied Sciences) electrical engineer in the renewable energy field. I also did some subjects about programming, finances, and business.
AcademicTimelineDescription.2: I studied electrical engineer, and I worked as a volunteer at 'Luz, Ciência e Emoção' and 'Projeto Lux'. My Undergraduate thesis, in partnership with the Lactec Institutes, was the design and construction of a device to simulate the accelerated aging of anchoring insulators in extreme situations.

ProfessionalTimelineDescription.0:
• Develop new features and maintain code pattern
• Collaborate with business and design meetings to create scalable and performance solutions to front end
• Make design pattern and storybook to help the integration with partners
• Technologies: Vue.js, Typescript, Git, Azure, SASS, Bootstrap
ProfessionalTimelineDescription.1: Ironhack  is an international school with campuses in 9 countries, with three different immersive courses: Web Development, UX/UI Design and Data Analytics. Helping the main teacher of Ironhack's part-time Web Development course. Subjects: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node, Express, Mongo and React.
ProfessionalTimelineDescription.2:
Worked at Santander and Sky clients
• Develop new features and maintain code pattern
• Technologies: Vue.js, Typescript, Git, CSS, Bootstrap
ProfessionalTimelineDescription.3:
Intern at 'Talent Factory' program:
• Development of projects focused on quality improvement, performance and cost reduction
• Support of Head of Production with PDCA Cycle, 5S and Kaizen Methodology
• Experience in different positions at the factory, like Operator (working with weld spot), Senior Operator and Quality Analyst

SecoundProfessionalTimelineDescription.0:
Current working at a startup of Santander: Empréstimos Sim.
• Responsible for making code review of the team
• Coach newly hired IT on technical procedures
• Manage the packages of all environments and deploy them
• Participation in analytics meeting to identify software issues
• Encouraged timely and relevant upgrades for clients products as necessary
• Fix problems in Production Environment
• Technologies: Vue.js, React, Typescript, Git, Azure, SASS, Bootstrap, Material Ui

AboutDescription.0: After painful classes of C++ at my University, I was sure programming was not for me. When I graduated, I desired to work with something that I could use my love for technology and creativity to make my path a meaningful one. And guess what? I found myself in the programming world and I couldn't feel more engineer as I feel nowadays!
AboutDescription.1:
I started this project to learn how to make a website truly from scratch: buy a domain, create the layout, choose the technologies, develop everything, control version code, storage, evaluate SEO and performance, improve, improve, improve, and finally publish it!! What is being used in this project:
ㅤ- Javascript (with React)
ㅤ- HTML and CSS
ㅤ- Github
ㅤ- S3 and Cloudfront by Amazon Web Services (AWS)
ㅤ- i18next library to translate content.
Next steps: learn how to make automated deployment and more about improve site performance
